type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.tasks.PublishToIvyRepository
type.description: * Publishes an IvyPublication to an IvyArtifactRepository. * * @since 1.3

method.name: getPublication
method.description: * The publication to be published. * * @return The publication to be published

method.name: getRepository
method.description: * The repository to publish to. * * @return The repository to publish to

method.name: setPublication
method.description: * Sets the publication to be published. * * @param publication The publication to be published

method.name: setRepository
method.description: * Sets the repository to publish to. * * @param repository The repository to publish to

property.name: publication
property.description: * The publication to be published. * * @return The publication to be published

property.name: repository
property.description: * The repository to publish to. * * @return The repository to publish to
